ChangeList.Description: Added the [Update onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-update?view=graph-rest-beta) operation for meeting updates.
The [presence](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/presence) resource now supports [change notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/webhooks).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get PSTN call report,get a direct routing report
ChangeList.Description: Added APIs to [get PSTN call report](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/callrecords-callrecord-getpstncalls?view=graph-rest-beta) and [get a direct routing report](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/callrecords-callrecord-getdirectroutingcalls?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: get PSTN call report,get a direct routing report

ChangeList.Description:
Added new entities:
  • [pstnCallLogRow](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-pstncalllogrow?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [directRoutingLogRow](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-directroutinglogrow?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added an additional path to the [Get presence](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/presence-get?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
Added the [onlineMeeting: createOrGet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-createorget) method.
Added an optional **externalId** property.
Added an optional **Accept-Language** header for [online meetings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting).
Added [Get callRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/callrecords-callrecord-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) API.

Added new entities:
  • [callRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-callrecord?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [session](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-session?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [segment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-segment?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Added new complex types:
  • [endpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-endpoint?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [participantEndpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-participantendpoint?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [serviceEndpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-serviceendpoint?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [userAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-useragent?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [serviceUserAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-serviceuseragent?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [clientUserAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-clientuseragent?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [userfeedback](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-userfeedback?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [feedbackTokenSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-feedbacktokenset?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [media](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-media?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [mediaStream](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-mediastream?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [networkInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-networkinfo?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [deviceInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-deviceinfo?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [failureInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-failureinfo?view=graph-rest-1.0)
Added support for [webhook](webhooks.md) subscriptions to call records.
Added **frequency60GHz** and **unknownFutureValue** to the **microsoft.graph.callRecords.wifiBand** enum.
Added **voicemail** to the **microsoft.graph.callRecords.serviceRole** enum.
Added the [List sessions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/callrecords-session-list?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
Added new property **initiator** to the [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added new complex types:, [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-1.0), [callRoute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callRoute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-1.0)
Added new property **recordingInfo** to the [participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participant?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added new property **recordingStatus** to the [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added new action [updateRecordingStatus](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-updaterecordingstatus?view=graph-rest-1.0) to the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added new property **endpointType** to the [participantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **countryCode** to the [participantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **incomingContext** to the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added new property **sourceParticipantId** to the [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **observedParticipantId** to the [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **onBehalfOf** to the [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **transferor** to the [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **CallRoutes** to the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added new property **final** to the [callRoute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callroute?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **original** to the [callRoute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callroute?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added new property **routingType** to the [callRoute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callroute?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the [logTeleconferenceDeviceQuality](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-logteleconferencedevicequality) function on the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call) collection.
Added the **callChainId** property to the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call) entity.

Added new complex types:, [teleconferenceDeviceQuality](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teleconferencedevicequality), [teleconferenceDeviceMediaQuality](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teleconferencedevicemediaquality), [teleconferenceDeviceAudioQuality](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teleconferencedeviceaudioquality), [teleconferenceDeviceVideoQuality](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teleconferencedevicevideoquality), [teleconferenceDeviceScreenSharingQuality](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teleconferencedevicescreensharingquality).
Added the [onlineMeeting: createOrGet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-createorget) method.
Added an optional **externalId** property to [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added an optional **Accept-Language** header for [online meetings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **initiator** property to the [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added [Get callRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/callrecords-callrecord-get?view=graph-rest-beta) API.

Added new entities:
  • [callRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-callrecord?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [session](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-session?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [segment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-segment?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added new complex types:
  • [endpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-endpoint?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [participantEndpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-participantendpoint?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [serviceEndpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-serviceendpoint?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [userAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-useragent?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [serviceUserAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-serviceuseragent?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [clientUserAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-clientuseragent?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [userfeedback](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-userfeedback?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [feedbackTokenSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-feedbacktokenset?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [media](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-media?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [mediaStream](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-mediastream?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [networkInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-networkinfo?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [deviceInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-deviceinfo?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [failureInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callrecords-failureinfo?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added support for [webhook](webhooks.md) subscriptions to call records.

Add the [presence](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/presence?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods, and introduced the Presence.Read and Presence.Read.All permissions.
Renamed IVR API Record to [recordResponse](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta).

Removed [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) object properties **isCanceled**, **canceledDateTime**, and **entryExitAnnouncement**. Renamed property **joinUrl** to **joinWebUrl**.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: create call,call answer,call reject,call get,call delete,call mute,call-unmute,call change screen sharing role,call transfer,call redirect,Play a prompt,Record Response,Subscribe to tne,list participants,invite participants,get participants,mute participants,create online meeting,get online meeting,call keep alive
ChangeList.Description: Added the following APIs: [create call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call answer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call reject](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call mute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-mute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call-unmute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call change screen sharing role](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call transfer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call redirect](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Play a prompt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Record Response](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-recordresponse?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Subscribe to tne](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-1.0), [list participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-1.0), [invite participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [mute participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [create online meeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get online meeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [call keep alive](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-keepalive?view=graph-rest-1.0).
ChangeList.Target: create call,call answer,call reject,call get,call delete,call mute,call-unmute,call change screen sharing role,call transfer,call redirect,Play a prompt,Record Response,Subscribe to tne,list participants,invite participants,get participants,mute participants,create online meeting,get online meeting,call keep alive

ChangeList.Description: Added the following resources: [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resouces/call?view=graph-rest-1.0), [participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resouces/participant?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resouces/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added the [delete onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-delete.md) operation.

Changed return type for [mute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) and [mute participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) methods from [commsOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) to [muteParticipantOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/muteparticipantoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Changed return type for [unmute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta) method from [commsOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) to [unmuteParticipantOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unmuteparticipantoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the [keepAlive](/api-reference/beta/api/call-keepalive.md) action to the [call](/api-reference/beta/resources/call.md) entity.

Added new action [updateRecordingStatus](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-updaterecordingstatus?view=graph-rest-beta) to [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new complex type [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new property **incomingContext** to [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new property **endpointType** to [participantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added new property **endpointType** to [invitationParticipantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitationparticipantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added new property **recordingStatus** to [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Removed property **status** from [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.

Removed inheritance of [participantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) from [invitationParticipantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitationparticipantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added /communications/* APIs for all calls and online meetings. The **/app** path is deprecated. Going forward, use the **/communications** path.
Removed the properties **createdDateTime** and **lastActionDateTime** from the [commsOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/.api/resource/commsOperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the property **meetingType** from the [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlineMeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the property **isBroadcast** to the [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlineMeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Renamed the **resource** property to **resourceUrl** on the [commsNotification](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsNotification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **code** and **subCode** properties from string to Int32 on the [resultInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resultInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Renamed the **subcode** property to **subCode** on the [resultInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resultInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added **mediaState** property to [call](/api-reference/beta/resources/call.md) resource
Renamed **recordResourceLocation** property in [recordOperation](/api-reference/beta/resources/recordOperation.md) resource to **recordingLocation**
Renamed **recordResourceAccessToken** property in [recordOperation](/api-reference/beta/resources/recordOperation.md) resource to **recordingAccessToken**
Added **capabilities** property to [onlineMeeting](/api-reference/beta/resources/onlinemeeting.md) resource
Added **videoTeleconferenceId** property to [onlineMeeting](/api-reference/beta/resources/onlinemeeting.md) resource
Added **producers** property to [meetingParticipants](/api-reference/beta/resources/meetingparticipants.md) resource
Added **contributors** property to [meetingParticipants](/api-reference/beta/resources/meetingparticipants.md) resource
The [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource was updated to add a calls collection.
The [operation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/operation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource was updated to support long-running calls and meetings APIs.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: call,creating calls,retrieving a call,deleting (hanging up) a call,answering a call,rejecting a call,redirecting a call,transferring a call,IVR scenarios,playing a prompt,recording a call,cancel media processing,subscribing to touch tone notifications
ChangeList.Description: Added the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for managing audio/video calls (initially, in Microsoft Teams), including APIs for [creating calls](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [deleting (hanging up) a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [answering a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-beta), [rejecting a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-beta), [redirecting a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-beta), and [transferring a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-beta). We've also added APIs to support [IVR scenarios](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calls-api-ivr-overview?view=graph-rest-beta): [playing a prompt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-beta), [recording a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta), [cancel media processing](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-cancelmediaprocessing?view=graph-rest-beta), and [subscribing to touch tone notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: call,creating calls,retrieving a call,deleting (hanging up) a call,answering a call,rejecting a call,redirecting a call,transferring a call,IVR scenarios,playing a prompt,recording a call,cancel media processing,subscribing to touch tone notifications

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: participant,retrieving a participant object,configuring the audio mixer for a participant,one,all,retrieving a list of the participants,inviting participants
ChangeList.Description: Added the [participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing the participants in audio/video calls and meetings, including [retrieving a participant object](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [configuring the audio mixer for a participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta), muting [one](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) or [all](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) of the participants, [retrieving a list of the participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) in a call/meeting, and [inviting participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) to a call/meeting.
ChangeList.Target: participant,retrieving a participant object,configuring the audio mixer for a participant,one,all,retrieving a list of the participants,inviting participants

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: share content,mute and unmute itself,update the metadata associated with a call
ChangeList.Description: Added APIs for applications to manage and participate in calls and meetings, including the ability to [share content](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [mute and unmute itself](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta), and [update the metadata associated with a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: share content,mute and unmute itself,update the metadata associated with a call

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: audio routing group,creating audio routing groups,retrieving a list of them,updating,deleting
ChangeList.Description: Added the [audio routing group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing private audio routes between participants in a multiparty conversation, including [creating audio routing groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a list of them](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [updating](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [deleting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) them.
ChangeList.Target: audio routing group,creating audio routing groups,retrieving a list of them,updating,deleting

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: online meeting,retrieve an online meeting object,audio conference information
ChangeList.Description: Added the [online meeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing Microsoft Teams online meetings. Initially, there is only one API for online meetings, to [retrieve an online meeting object](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta). A related resource for the [audio conference information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta) associated with a meeting (e.g. dial-in URL, passcodes, and phone numbers) was also added.
ChangeList.Target: online meeting,retrieve an online meeting object,audio conference information

ChangeList.Description: Many of the calls and meetings APIs take time to complete, so resources for these long-running operations were added: [calling-specific operations](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [playing audio prompts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [recording](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).
